settings.testimonial: I found this lighter to be very effective for starting a fire and that is what I would need it for. I have an emergency radio that can charge devices like this with a crank or solar power so having a lighter like this is essential for any preppers. For this price, it has been a complete steal. Super reliable, and I love that it is rechargeable. Giving me my moneys worth. 5 stars for a lighter that can light fires for you even in a disaster!
settings.author: Moyeez Asif

settings.testimonial: The Tesla Lighter met and exceeded all my expectations - it’s phenomenal for out-door use in all weather conditions - I'll never buy a normal lighter again
settings.author: Cole

settings.testimonial: Great little lighter. Super pretty. Slide your finger up to get the flame to come on. It’s touchscreen! And the best part...it’s chargeable!!! I never need to buy fluid again. This would make an amazing gift. Just ordered 3 more.
settings.author: Blake W.
